custom-sql.sql: SELECT {CTProcess.*} FROM CTProcess INNER JOIN CTCollection ON CTProcess.ctCollectionId = CTCollection.ctCollectionId INNER JOIN BackgroundTask ON CTProcess.backgroundTaskId = BackgroundTask.backgroundTaskId WHERE (CTProcess.companyId = ?) AND (CTProcess.userId = ?) AND (BackgroundTask.status = ?) AND ( (LOWER(CTCollection.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (LOWER(CTCollection.description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY CTProcess.createDate DESC
